Name: umbrela
StackFileContent:
version: "3"
services:
  sso:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/sso-server:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:sso-server.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8080
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  authz:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/authz-server:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    environment:
      - DB_COMUM_URL=sigdev.unila:54326/sistemas_comum
      - DB_COMUM_USER=comum_user
      - DB_COMUM_PASS=comum_user
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:authz-server.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8080
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  security:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/security-services:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:security-services.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8082
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  comum:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/comum-services:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:comum-services.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8087
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  pessoa:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/pessoa-services:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:pessoa-services.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8084
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  protocolo:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/protocolo-services:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:protocolo-services.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8088
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  unidade:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/unidade-services:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:unidade-services.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8085
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  usuario:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/usuario-services:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:usuario-services.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8083
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  vinculo:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/vinculo-services:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:vinculo-services.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8086
        - traefik.default.protocol=http

  memorando:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/memorando:latest
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:memorando.sistemas.unila
        - traefik.port=8080
        - traefik.default.protocol=http
networks:
  traefik-net:
    external: true
  internal:
    driver: overlay

Name: portalprocessos
StackFileContent:
version: "3.3"
services:
  mysql:
    image: mysql:5.7
    volumes:
      - /volumes/portalprocessos/data:/var/lib/mysql
    restart: always
    networks:
      - internal    
    environment:
      MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: mysql
      MYSQL_DATABASE: wordpress
      MYSQL_USER: wordpress
      MYSQL_PASSWORD: wordpress

  wordpress:
    image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/portalprocessos:latest
    depends_on:
      - mysql
    networks:
      - internal
      - traefik-net
    deploy:
      labels:
        - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
        - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:processos.suape.unila
        - traefik.default.protocol=https
        - traefik.port=443
    volumes:
     - /volumes/portalprocessos/wp-config.php:/usr/src/wordpress/wp-config.php
     - /volumes/portalprocessos/wp-content:/usr/src/wordpress/wp-content
networks:
  traefik-net:
    external: true
  internal:
    driver: overlay

Name: portalprocessos2
StackFileContent:
version: '3.3'
services:
   mysql:
     image: mysql:5.7
     volumes:
       - /volumes/portalprocessos2/data:/var/lib/mysql
     networks:
        - internal
     environment:
       MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD: root
       MYSQL_DATABASE: wordpress
       MYSQL_USER: wordpress
       MYSQL_PASSWORD: wordpress

   wordpress:
     depends_on:
       - portalprocessos2_mysql
     image: hub.docker.unila/dsis/portalprocessos:latest
     deploy:
        labels:
          - traefik.docker.network=traefik-net
          - traefik.frontend.rule=Host:processos.suape.unila
          - traefik.default.protocol=https
          - traefik.port=443       
     volumes:
          - /volumes/portalprocessos2/wp-content:/usr/src/wordpress/wp-content
          - /volumes/portalprocessos2/wp-config.php:/usr/src/wordpress/wp-config.php
     networks:
        - internal
        - traefik-net 
     environment:
       WORDPRESS_DB_HOST: portalprocessos2_mysql:3306
       WORDPRESS_DB_USER: wordpress
       WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD: wordpress
       WORDPRESS_DB_NAME: wordpress
networks:
      traefik-net:
        external: true
      internal:
        driver: overlay
